body:
# About

I am an author and curator of RubyFlow.ru and RubyJobs.ru. The first one is a community blog dedicated to Ruby language. RubyJobs.ru is a job board with Ruby/Rails related vacancies. Both projects are open sourced and could be found on GitHub.

Contacts: [@soulim](http://twitter.com/soulim) Â· <alex@soulim.com>
tagline: Ruby developer, open source contributor, former CTO of R&D department HeiaHeia.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Alex Soulim
